name: Lonta Pel
description:
Sinopsis:
Lonta Pel is a MultiPlayer Casual Sport Game, you ride a Lonta (Pig) and needs to make your team win. The rider is Sirina and is one of the best riders on Limbo continent.

Mechanics:
Catch the balls of the color of your team and bring it to the base

  • 1 ball: 2 points 
  •  2 balls: 5 points 

The Team wins by scoring 50 points

GameJam Version: Alias BlackHoleBuggy

The attack and life hasn't properly implemented, Dash with Jump are part buggy XD,

The GamePad doesn't work at all ;(, had some buttons dont working.
